name: fastify-auth-skeleton
description: A skeleton project with typescript typeorm & jwt authentication

scripts.dev: npm run clean && tsc && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypeScript,App" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold" "tsc -w" "fastify start --ignore-watch=.ts$ -w -l info -P dist/app.js"
scripts.start: npm run build && fastify start -l info dist/app.js

author: SEK-Consulting
